update WEB_CLIENT
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CLIENT_NAME = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLIENT_SEX = #{clientSex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CLIENT_MOBILE = #{clientMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLIENT_ICCODE = #{clientIccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where CLIENT_ID = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
